name: Logic Machines (DS)
description:
'Logic Machines' is a puzzle-based title developed by Avalanche Software LLC. It was released for the Nintendo DS on November 13th, 2010. It could be described as being similar to 'The Incredible Machine', another noteworthy game with logic-based mechanics.

Set forth on a quest to become a puzzle master! Use your keen sense of logic and the Laws of Physics to solve brain teasing puzzles. With an outlook focusing on Egyptian mythology, have your hands tinker with a plethora of physics-based contraptions to reach the objective.

There is no single way of doing it, either- adjust platforms, tip objects into one another, set balloons high into the sky, shoot said balloons with crossbows, teleporters... and that's only scratching the surface! Experiment with your large lineup of tools, or even take it a step further by challenging yourself, and discover what works best for each goal.
